doctors.name: Dr. Sarah Lee
doctors.overview: With more than 15 years of experience learning human psychology and behavior, Dr. Jones is an expert in managing mood disorders and anxiety disorders.

degrees.school: University of California, Los Angeles (UCLA) Medical Center

experiences: Worked in community mental health clinics, private practice, and academic medical centers
Expertise in the treatment of mood disorders, anxiety disorders, and psychotic disorders
Special interest in women's mental health and perinatal psychiatry
Experience managing complex cases that involve both mental health and medical issues

doctors.name: Dr. Fiona Wood
doctors.overview: Dr. Wood is a renowned cardiologist with over 20 years of experience in treating cardiovascular diseases and performing complex cardiac procedures.
experiences: Specialized in interventional cardiology and cardiac catheterization
Published over 50 research papers in cardiovascular medicine
Director of Cardiac Catheterization Laboratory
Expert in treating coronary artery disease and heart failure

doctors.name: Dr. Michael Brown
doctors.overview: Dr. Brown is a leading neurologist specializing in neurodegenerative diseases and movement disorders with extensive research background.
experiences: Specialist in Parkinson's disease and movement disorders
Lead researcher in neurodegenerative disease clinical trials
Published extensively on Alzheimer's disease and dementia
Director of Movement Disorders Clinic

doctors.name: Dr. Angela Davis
doctors.overview: Dr. Davis is an expert dermatologist with a focus on cosmetic dermatology, skin cancer prevention, and advanced dermatological procedures.
experiences: Specialist in cosmetic and medical dermatology
Expert in skin cancer detection and treatment
Advanced training in laser therapy and aesthetic procedures
Published research on melanoma prevention and treatment

doctors.name: Dr. James Wilson
doctors.overview: Dr. Wilson is a compassionate pediatrician dedicated to providing comprehensive healthcare for children from infancy through adolescence.

degrees.school: University of Pennsylvania School of Medicine

experiences: Specialized care for newborns, children, and adolescents
Expert in childhood development and behavioral health
Vaccination and preventive care specialist
Experience in managing chronic pediatric conditions

doctors.name: Dr. Maria Rodriguez
doctors.overview: Dr. Rodriguez provides comprehensive women's healthcare services with a focus on maternal-fetal medicine and minimally invasive surgical techniques.

degrees.school: University of Miami Miller School of Medicine
American College of Obstetricians and Gynecologists

experiences: Specialist in high-risk pregnancies and maternal-fetal medicine
Expert in minimally invasive gynecological surgery
Women's reproductive health and family planning
Menopause management and hormone therapy
